author: Robin Marx
description:
The 2025 Free Comic Book Day issue of Conan the Barbarian is set shortly after the beginning of his adventuring career. Though the Cimmerian is only 17, already he has participated in the Sack of Venarium and then fallen in with a raiding party in the frozen north. After an uncanny close encounter with the […]

The post REVIEW: Conan the Barbarian Free Comic Book Day 2025: Scourge of the Serpent appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Conan the Barbarian Free Comic Book Day 2025: Scourge of the Serpent
